content: times join with a slip_stitch to beg chain-2 round 44 arch increase row chain 2 fpdc 64 bpdc fpdc on next post bpdc twice cable twist bpdc fpdc bpdc twice cable twist rnds 54-56 chain 2 cable bpdc fpdc bpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc on next post bpdc twice 7 times join with a slip_stitch to beg chain-2 twice cable twist bpdc fpdc bpdc twice 64 3 times cable twist join with a slip_stitch to beg chain-2 62 rnds 57-70 repeat row 52 55 or until desired length is achieved more yardage rnds 45-47 chain 2 fpdc bpdc 4 times cable will be required 64 bpdc fpdc bpdc twice cable bpdc fpdc bpdc 4 times cable bpdc fpdc bpdc fasten_off and weave in ends twice 3 times cable join with a slip_stitch to beg chain-2 62 after-thought heel round 48 chain 2 fpdc bpdc 4 times cable join yarn any where in the heel opening single_crochet twist bpdc fpdc bpdc twice cable twist around placing 2 single_crochet decrease at each corner of bpdc fpdc bpdc 4 times cable twist the heel work in a spiral until the two long bpdc fpdc bpdc twice 3 times cable sides of the heel come together or about 13 twist join with a slip_stitch to beg chain-2 62 rounds slip_stitch the opening closed fasten_off and weave in ends round 49 repeat round 45 62 round 50 beg heel opening chain 32 loosely skip © 2007 little river fiber arts - lauren irving this pattern is intended for your personal use and charitable donation only 31 sts join with slip_stitch to last bpdc of 2nd arch please do not post this pattern on anywhere else on the web increase chain 2 cable bpdc fpdc bpdc or claim it as your own please feel free to link to this site the items you make belong to you and you may sell them at craft twice 3 times cable do not join 32 sts fairs as long as you give me credit as the designer please ask permission before selling online selling in mass to retail or wholesale stores is prohibited contact me with questions round 51 half row single_crochet across 32 chs join with at laureni526 at yahoo dot com a slip_stitch to the next fpdc 32 yes this is different from the standard mechanics of crochet but since this part of the heel flexes up at almost a 45-degree angle it does work and keeps the heel row even with the pattern
